entry.title: hax-camp
entry.summary: Yes. HAX camp (as tag, hax-camp). This HAXcms site is a WiP.HAX camp is a first of its kind unconference dedicated to all thing Web components.Have you made something cool with Web components a

entry.title: Register
entry.summary: Coming soon.. but seriously you'll want to register

entry.title: Why should I attend
entry.summary: Why should I comeGet training in WCFactory from the people behind #HAXTheWebLearn from others about how they are using web componentsLearn about HAXiam, HAXcms, and HAXeditor
entry.content: Why should I comeGet training in WCFactory from the people behind #HAXTheWebLearn from others about how they are using web componentsLearn about HAXiam, HAXcms, and HAXeditor

entry.title: Convince my Hippo
entry.summary: HiPPO (Highest Paid Person's Opinion) is super important to getting funding to come to HAX camp. Here's some easy reasons they'll be thrilled to send you:Web components can be used in any Content Man
entry.content: HiPPO (Highest Paid Person's Opinion) is super important to getting funding to come to HAX camp. Here's some easy reasons they'll be thrilled to send you:Web components can be used in any Content Man

entry.title: Where?
entry.summary: State College Pennsylvania. It's in the middle of the state next to a giant university. There's an airport, cows, and most importantly, web components discussions to be had and new friends to make.
entry.content: State College Pennsylvania. It's in the middle of the state next to a giant university. There's an airport, cows, and most importantly, web components discussions to be had and new friends to make.

entry.title: Unconference?
entry.summary: If you've never been, they are awesome. here's a basic definition from Wikipedia.Effectively, the people who show up form the schedule and go from there. HAX camp is not a pure Unconference as there
entry.content: If you've never been, they are awesome. here's a basic definition from Wikipedia.Effectively, the people who show up form the schedule and go from there. HAX camp is not a pure Unconference as there

entry.title: CoC
entry.summary: Code of Conduct.Don't troll people by showing VDOM and everything will be cool.No but seriously...Our pledgeIn the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as organizers pledge
entry.content: Code of Conduct.Don't troll people by showing VDOM and everything will be cool.No but seriously...Our pledgeIn the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as organizers pledge
